comments.body: Hi @s-hertel is the deprecation scheduled to occur with 2.10 or sooner? If its happening with 2.10 I think it would provide better clarity to rephrase the first sentence to  "The ``params`` module option in ``ldap_attr`` and ``ldap_entry`` is deprecated in Ansible 2.10 due to circumventing Ansible's normal option handling.
@cbudz the options are deprecated now, and will be gone in Ansible 2.10.
thanks @felixfontein, please disregard my comment in that case.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +107,111 @@----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The ``params`` module option in ``ldap_attr`` and ``ldap_entry`` are deprecated on a short cycle (to
be removed in Ansible-2.10) due to circumventing Ansible's normal option handling.  In particular,
